name: Ruination (itch) (actuallyKron)
description:
move left, right and up. destroy all the blocks and jump into the portal to move on to the next portal. there's 11 levels in total and you're on the clock. have fun!


made in the godot engine
colour pallet is pico-8-secret-palette
font used in game is monogram
thumbnail font is fibberish
sound made using sfxr (don't have download link, sorry)

this game was inspired by another game that i played on here a bit a go but I can't seem to find it now. If you think you know the game please link it in the comments so that I can credit it.
